column3:
“Really clean buzz, hardcore dry mouth, uplifting.I'm pretty much an Indica guy.This bud picked me up, slapped me around and placed me in the couch.Why not a 5? 
5 should be kept to an extremely high standard , perfection.”
“Me and my wife underestimated this strain!!! It will creep up on you! The effects were pretty calming and relexing with a burst of happiness and smiles 😁”

“got it for a good deal. $6 a gram because this batch had seeds. idk what it goes for regularly. the seeds were easy to pick out. 

the flavor was good. it was a pretty good high. Mello but not sleepy. good daytime bud. I would get it again.”
“I totally love this strain in the pharmabee brand pen called killer purple its amazing for pain and menstrual cycle discomfort.”
“felt like smokin a big bag of grapes. super dry mouth, very hungry right after!!!”
“Felt like i was smokin a big bag if grapes. Super dry mouth, along with the munchies and i dont get the munchies”
“Smells like an early red wine,but with sweet hints.”
“This stuff is the real deal, smells and tastes incredible and the High is great. Heady upstairs and nice body buzz too , mmmmm 🔪🍇🍇🍇🤓🤙🏼”
“Great strain... Makes me focus and has a unique taste... And it's purple”
“Great strain ,like all tga genetics...to much sticky crystals on the bud and fan leaves to...(just cwrazy)very sweet for hasj making ...for sure.... good luck and love to all🖒”

“so my wife and I just had our beloved ritual- Sunday 420pm smoke sesh. and she said I used safe space" as a verb as I tried to hide under my fleece bathrobe. that's besides the point bc after the first bong of this spectacular strain we were laughing and giggling like children. the flower is beautiful
column5: and shiny crystals when you crack her open. So off to 🚬 round 2. I highly recommend this flower...”"

column3: “My favorite strain! Wonderful fruity taste and after smoking it I want to do everything: clean my house, paint, go work out etc.”

“Killer Grape is extremely medicinal. An anxiety/stress killer for sure and extremely useful for sleep. The flavorful profile is unusual, the jars I've cured radiate a fruity smell entirely unique to this strain. Though she isn't the highest yielder you bet that every sugar leaf is coated. The resins will stick to your hands and leave a sheen on your fingers from how rich it is.”
“Music sounds incredible! Even songs that I would normally skip, I played to the end. Huge head high, made me productive, I would not recommend using this during corporate work though.”
